Object Shape: Cigar, Cone, Cylinder, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Triangle
divs: sighting detailsfrom app. 10:00pm, 2\07, until 6:15am, 2\08, we witnessed many unusual and fantastic objects above austin, texas. i managed to capture almost three minutes of video of one of the vehicles and though it is excellent quality it doesn't represent the machine accurately. in fact, all the objects were better seen with the naked eye than with magnification. we saw at least four different machines: cylinders, triangles, rectangles and saucers though the rectangular ships could have also been triangular. their lights were stunning -- often brilliant -- with a purity of color that's difficult to describe.i will post more information soon but i would ike to reitterate that this was an extraordinary event and i would be surprised if many, many people did not see what we saw. for those of you who were not fortunate enough to see these amazing objects for yourselves, i have video and i will post it asap.
